```{r}
library(googlesheets)
classSurvey<-gs_read(gsSurvey,ws=1) #access the 1st worksheet
```

```{r}
StuDF <- data.frame(
  StuID=c(1,2,3,4,5),
  name=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  score=c(80,60,90,70,50)
  )
StuDF 
```

```{r}
as.character(StuDF$name) -> StuDF$name
```

```{r}
StuDF <- data.frame(
  StuID=c(1,2,3,4,5),
  name=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  score=c(80,60,90,70,50))
stringsAsFactors = F
StuDF
  
```
